tika-s0402t34:2_0: 1-2. Catukkanipātassa paṭhame anubodho pubbabhāgiyaṁ ñāṇaṁ, paṭivedho anubodhena
tika-s0402t34:2_1: abhisamayo. Tattha yasmā anubodhapubbako paṭivedho anubodhena vinā na hoti. Anubodho
tika-s0402t34:2_2: hi ekacco paṭivedhasambaddho, tadubhayābhāvahetukañca vaṭṭe saṁsaraṇaṁ, tasmā vuttaṁ
tika-s0402t34:2_4: sandhāvanaṁ, aparāparaṁ cavanūpapajjanavasena sañcaraṇaṁ saṁsaraṇanti āha “bhavato”tiādi.
tika-s0402t34:2_5: Sandhāvitasaṁsaritapadānaṁ kammasādhanataṁ sandhāyāha “mayā ca tumhehi cā”ti paṭhamavikappe.
tika-s0402t34:2_6: Dutiyavikappe pana bhāvasādhanataṁ hadaye katvā “mamañceva tumhākañcā”ti yathārutavaseneva
tika-s0402t34:2_7: vuttaṁ. Dīgharajjunā baddhasakuṇaṁ viya rajjuhattho puriso desantaraṁ taṇhārajjunā
tika-s0402t34:2_8: baddhaṁ sattasantānaṁ abhisaṅkhāro bhavantaraṁ neti etāyāti bhavanetti. Tenāha “bhavarajjū”tiādī.
tika-s0402t34:3_0: Vaṭṭadukkhassa antakaroti sakalavaṭṭadukkhassa sakasantāne parasantāne ca vināsakaro
tika-s0402t34:3_2: pañcahi cakkhūhi cakkhumā. Savāsanānaṁ kilesānaṁ samucchinnattā sātisayaṁ kilesaparinibbānena
tika-s0402t34:6_0: 3-4. Tatiye kalinti aparādhaṁ. Vicinātīti ācinoti pasavati. Tena ca kalinā sukhaṁ
tika-s0402t34:6_1: na paṭilabhatīti tena aparādhena sukhaṁ na vindati. Nindiyappasaṁsāya hi pasaṁsiyanindāya
tika-s0402t34:6_2: ca samakova vipāko. Pasaṁsiyanindāti ca sampannaguṇaparidhaṁsanavasena pavattiyā
tika-s0402t34:6_3: mahāsāvajjatāya kaṭukataravipākā. Nindiyappasaṁsā pana kathaṁ tāya samavipākāti ce?
tika-s0402t34:6_4: Tasmiṁ avijjamānaguṇasamāropanena attano paresañca micchāpaṭipattihetubhāvato pasaṁsiyena
tika-s0402t34:6_5: tassa sabbhāvakaraṇato ca. Lokepi hi asūraṁ sūrena samaṁ karonto gārayho hoti, pageva
tika-s0402t34:6_6: duppaṭipannaṁ suppaṭipannena samaṁ karontoti. Sakena dhanenāti attano sāpateyyena.
tika-s0402t34:6_7: Appamattakova kalīti diṭṭhadhammikattā sappaṭikārattā ca appamattako aparādho. Ayaṁ…pe…
tika-s0402t34:6_8: mahantataro kali katūpacitattā samparāyikattā appaṭikārattā ca.
tika-s0402t34:7_0: Nirabbudoti gaṇanāviseso esoti āha “nirabbudagaṇanāyā”ti, satasahassaṁ nirabbudāti
tika-s0402t34:7_1: attho. Nirabbudaparimāṇaṁ pana vassagaṇanāya evaṁ veditabbaṁ. Yatheva hi sataṁ satasahassānaṁ
tika-s0402t34:7_2: koṭi hoti, evaṁ sataṁ satasahassānaṁ koṭiyo pakoṭi nāma hoti, sataṁ satasahassānaṁ
tika-s0402t34:7_3: pakoṭiyo koṭipakoṭi, sataṁ satasahassakoṭipakoṭiyo nahutaṁ, sataṁ satasahassanahutāni
tika-s0402t34:7_4: ninnahutaṁ, sataṁ satasahassaninnahutāni ekaṁ abbudaṁ, tato vīsatiguṇitaṁ nirabbudaṁ.
tika-s0402t34:7_5: Yaṁ ariye garahanto nirayaṁ upapajjatīti ariye garahanto yaṁ nirabbudasaṅkhātaṁ nirayaṁ
tika-s0402t34:7_6: upapajjati, nirabbudoti ca pāṭiyekko nirayo natthi, avīcimhiyeva pana nirabbudagaṇanāya
tika-s0402t34:10_0: 5. Pañcame anusotaṁ gacchatīti saṁsārasotassa anukūlabhāvena gacchati. Paccanīkapaṭipattiyāti
tika-s0402t34:10_2: acalappasādādisamannāgamena ṭhitasabhāvo. Anāgāmī hi assaddhiyehi kāmarāgabyāpādehi
tika-s0402t34:10_3: akampaniyacittatāya tamhā lokā anāvattidhammatāya ca ṭhitasabhāvo nāma. Oghaṁ taritvāti
tika-s0402t34:10_4: kāmoghādicatubbidhaṁ oghaṁ atikkamitvā. Paratīraṁ gatoti nibbānapāraṁ gato. Brāhmaṇoti
tika-s0402t34:10_5: bāhitapāpatāya brāhmaṇoti saṅkhaṁ gato khīṇāsavo. Tenāha “seṭṭho niddoso”ti. Pañcaverakammanti
tika-s0402t34:10_6: pāṇātipātādipañcaduccaritaṁ. Sahāpi dukkhena sahāpi domanassenāti kilesapariyuṭṭhāne
tika-s0402t34:10_7: sati uppannena dukkhadomanassena saddhimpi. Paripuṇṇanti tissannaṁ sikkhānaṁ ekāyapi
tika-s0402t34:10_8: anūnaṁ. Parisuddhanti nirupakkilesaṁ. Brahmacariyanti seṭṭhacariyaṁ. Iminā vārena
tika-s0402t34:10_9: sotāpannasakadāgāmino kathitā. Kiṁ pana te rudantā brahmacariyaṁ carantīti? Āma,
tika-s0402t34:10_10: kilesarodanena rodantā caranti nāma, sīlasampanno puthujjanabhikkhu ettheva saṅgahito.
tika-s0402t34:11_0: Cetovimuttinti phalasamādhiṁ. Paññāvimuttinti phalañāṇaṁ. Chahākārehi pāragatoti
tika-s0402t34:11_1: abhiññāpāragū, pariññāpāragū, bhāvanāpāragū, pahānapāragū, sacchikiriyāpāragū, samāpattipāragūti
tika-s0402t34:11_2: evaṁ chahi ākārehi sabbadhammānaṁ pāraṁ pariyosānaṁ gato. Sesamettha suviññeyyameva.
tika-s0402t34:14_0: 6. Chaṭṭhe appakaṁ sutaṁ hotīti navaṅgasatthusāsane kiñcideva sutaṁ hoti. Tadeva
tika-s0402t34:14_1: navaṅgasatthusāsanaṁ dassetuṁ “suttaṁ geyya”ntiādi vuttaṁ. Tattha suttādīni vibhajitvā
tika-s0402t34:14_3: yujjeyya. Sagāthakañhi suttaṁ geyyaṁ, niggāthakaṁ suttaṁ veyyākaraṇaṁ. Tadubhayavinimuttañca
tika-s0402t34:14_4: suttaṁ udānādivisesasaññārahitaṁ natthi, yaṁ suttaṅgaṁ siyā. Maṅgalasuttādīnañca
tika-s0402t34:14_5: suttaṅgasaṅgaho na siyā gāthābhāvato dhammapadādīnaṁ viya. Geyyaṅgasaṅgaho vā siyā
tika-s0402t34:14_6: sagāthakattā sagāthāvaggassa viya. Tathā ubhatovibhaṅgādīsu sagāthakappadesānanti? Vuccate –
tika-s0402t34:17_0: Sabbassapi hi buddhavacanassa suttanti ayaṁ sāmaññavidhi. Tenevāha āyasmā mahākaccāno
tika-s0402t34:17_1: nettiyaṁ “navavidhasuttantapariyeṭṭhī”ti. Ettakaṁ tassa bhagavato suttāgataṁ suttapariyāpannaṁ
tika-s0402t34:17_2: sakavāde pañca suttasatānīti evamādi ca etassa atthassa sādhakaṁ. Visesavidhayo pare
tika-s0402t34:17_3: sanimittā tadekadesesu geyyādayo visesavidhayo tena tena nimittena patiṭṭhitā. Tathā
tika-s0402t34:17_4: hi geyyassa sagāthakattaṁ tabbhāvanimittaṁ. Lokepi hi sasilokaṁ sagāthakaṁ vā cuṇṇiyaganthaṁ
tika-s0402t34:17_5: “geyya”nti vadanti. Gāthāvirahe pana sati pucchaṁ katvā vissajjanabhāvo veyyākaraṇassa
tika-s0402t34:17_7: Evaṁ sante sagāthakādīnampi pucchaṁ katvā vissajjanavasena pavattānaṁ veyyākaraṇabhāvo
tika-s0402t34:17_8: āpajjatīti? Nāpajjati geyyādisaññānaṁ anokāsabhāvato, “gāthāvirahe satī”ti visesitattā
tika-s0402t34:17_9: ca. Tathā hi dhammapadādīsu kevalaṁ gāthābandhesu sagāthakattepi somanassañāṇamayikagāthāyuttesu
tika-s0402t34:17_11: yathākkamaṁ gāthāudānaitivuttakaabbhutadhammasaññā patiṭṭhitā, tathā satipi gāthābandhabhāve
tika-s0402t34:17_12: bhagavato atītāsu jātīsu cariyānubhāvappakāsakesu jātakasaññā, satipi pañhavissajjanabhāve
tika-s0402t34:17_13: sagāthakatte ca kesuci suttantesu vedassa labhāpanato vedallasaññā patiṭṭhitāti evaṁ
tika-s0402t34:17_14: tena tena sagāthakattādinā nimittena tesu tesu suttavisesesu geyyādisaññā patiṭṭhitāti
tika-s0402t34:17_15: visesavidhayo suttaṅgato pare geyyādayo. Yaṁ panettha geyyaṅgādinimittarahitaṁ, taṁ
tika-s0402t34:17_16: suttaṅgaṁ visesasaññāparihārena sāmaññasaññāya pavattanato. Nanu ca sagāthakaṁ suttaṁ
tika-s0402t34:17_17: geyyaṁ, niggāthakaṁ suttaṁ veyyākaraṇanti suttaṅgaṁ na sambhavatīti codanā tadavatthāvāti?
tika-s0402t34:17_18: Na tadavatthā sodhitattā. Sodhitañhi pubbe “gāthāvirahe sati pucchāvissajjanabhāvo
tika-s0402t34:18_0: Yañca vuttaṁ – “gāthābhāvato maṅgalasuttādīnaṁ suttaṅgasaṅgaho na siyā”ti, taṁ na,
tika-s0402t34:18_1: niruḷhattā. Niruḷho hi maṅgalasuttādīnaṁ suttabhāvo. Na hi tāni dhammapadabuddhavaṁsādayo
tika-s0402t34:18_2: viya gāthābhāvena paññātāni, atha kho suttabhāveneva, teneva hi aṭṭhakathāyaṁ “suttanāmaka”nti
tika-s0402t34:18_3: nāmaggahaṇaṁ kataṁ. Yaṁ pana vuttaṁ “sagāthakattā geyyaṅgasaṅgaho siyā”ti, tadapi
tika-s0402t34:18_4: natthi, yasmā sahatāññena. Saha gāthāhīti hi sagāthakaṁ. Sahabhāvo nāma atthato aññena
tika-s0402t34:18_5: hoti, na ca maṅgalasuttādīsu gāthāvinimutto koci suttappadeso atthi, yo “saha gāthāhī”ti
tika-s0402t34:18_6: vucceyya, na ca samudāyo nāma koci atthi. Yadapi vuttaṁ – “ubhatovibhaṅgādīsu sagāthakappadesānaṁ
tika-s0402t34:18_7: geyyaṅgasaṅgaho siyā”ti, tadapi na, aññato. Aññā eva hi tā gāthā jātakādipariyāpannattā.
tika-s0402t34:18_8: Ato na tāhi ubhatovibhaṅgādīnaṁ geyyaṅgabhāvoti. Evaṁ suttādīnaṁ aṅgānaṁ aññamaññaṁ
tika-s0402t34:18_9: saṅkarābhāvo veditabbo. Ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana samantapāsādikāya vinayasaṁvaṇṇanāya
tika-s0402t34:18_10: sāratthadīpaniyā amhehi pakāsito, icchantehi tatoyeva gahetabbo.
tika-s0402t34:19_0: Na atthamaññāya dhammamaññāya dhammānudhammappaṭipanno hotīti aṭṭhakathāñca pāḷiñca
tika-s0402t34:19_1: jānitvā lokuttaradhammassa anurūpadhammaṁ pubbabhāgappaṭipadaṁ paṭipanno na hotīti
tika-s0402t34:19_2: evamettha sambandho veditabbo. Tenevāha “na atthamaññāya dhammamaññāyāti aṭṭhakathañca
tika-s0402t34:22_1: tadaṅgādivasena kilesānaṁ vinayaṁ upetā. Vesārajjenāti sārajjakarānaṁ diṭṭhivicikicchādipāpadhammānaṁ
tika-s0402t34:22_2: vigamanato vesārajjena, sārajjarahitenāti attho. Tepiṭakavasena bahu sutaṁ etesanti
tika-s0402t34:22_3: bahussutā. Tameva pariyattidhammaṁ dhārenti suvaṇṇabhājane pakkhittasīhavasaṁ viya
tika-s0402t34:22_4: vinassantaṁ akatvā suppaguṇasuppavattibhāvena hadaye ṭhapentīti dhammadharā. Edisā
tika-s0402t34:22_5: ca attanā sutassa dhammassa ādhārabhūtā nāma hontīti āha “sutadhammānaṁ ādhārabhūtā”ti.
tika-s0402t34:25_0: 8. Aṭṭhame byāmohavasena saraṇapariyesanaṁ sārajjanaṁ sārado, byāmohabhayaṁ. Vigato
tika-s0402t34:25_1: sārado etassāti visārado, tassa bhāvo vesārajjaṁ. Taṁ pana ñāṇasampadaṁ, pahānasampadaṁ,
tika-s0402t34:25_2: desanāvisesasampadaṁ khemañca nissāya pavattaṁ catubbidhapaccavekkhaṇañāṇaṁ. Tenāha
tika-s0402t34:25_3: “catūsu ṭhānesū”tiādi. Usabhassa idanti āsabhaṁ, seṭṭhaṭṭhānaṁ. Sabbaññutapaṭijānanavasena
tika-s0402t34:25_4: abhimukhaṁ gacchanti, aṭṭha vā parisā upasaṅkamantīti āsabhā, pubbabuddhā. Idaṁ panāti
tika-s0402t34:25_5: buddhānaṁ ṭhānaṁ sabbaññutameva vadati. Tiṭṭhamānovāti avadantopi tiṭṭhamānova paṭijānāti
tika-s0402t34:26_0: Aṭṭhasu parisāsūti “abhijānāmi kho panāhaṁ, sāriputta, anekasataṁ khattiyaparisaṁ
tika-s0402t34:26_2: tāvatiṁsaparisaṁ, māraparisaṁ, brahmaparisaṁ upasaṅkamitā, tatrapi mayā sannisinnapubbañceva
tika-s0402t34:26_3: sallapitapubbañca sākacchā ca samāpajjitapubbā. Tatra vata maṁ ‘bhayaṁ vā sārajjaṁ
tika-s0402t34:26_4: vā okkamissatī’ti nimittametaṁ, sāriputta, na samanupassāmī”ti evaṁ vuttaparisāsu.
tika-s0402t34:26_5: Abhītanādaṁ nadatīti parato dassitañāṇayogena visārado ahanti abhītanādaṁ nadati.
tika-s0402t34:27_2: vā vuttā. Ādi-saddena tattha ca cakkasaddassa gahaṇaṁ veditabbaṁ. Vicakkasaṇṭhānā
tika-s0402t34:27_3: asani eva asanivicakkaṁ. Uracakkādīsūti ādi-saddena āṇāsamūhādīsupi cakkasaddassa
tika-s0402t34:27_4: pavatti veditabbā. “Saṅghabhedaṁ karissāma cakkabheda”ntiādīsu hi āṇā “cakka”nti
tika-s0402t34:28_0: Paṭivedhaniṭṭhattā arahattamaggañāṇaṁ paṭivedhoti “phalakkhaṇe uppannaṁ nāmā”ti vuttaṁ.
tika-s0402t34:28_1: Tena paṭiladdhassapi desanāñāṇassa kiccanipphatti parassa bujjhanamattena hotīti
tika-s0402t34:28_2: “aññāsikoṇḍaññassa sotāpatti…pe… phalakkhaṇe pavattaṁ nāmā”ti vuttaṁ. Tato paraṁ
tika-s0402t34:28_3: pana yāva parinibbānā desanāñāṇappavatti tasseva pavattitassa dhammacakkassa ṭhānanti veditabbaṁ.
tika-s0402t34:29_0: Dassitadhammesūti vuttadhammesu. Vacanamattameva hi tesaṁ, na pana dassanaṁ tādisasseva
tika-s0402t34:29_1: dhammassa abhāvato. Bhagavato eva vā “ime dhammā anabhisambuddho”ti parassa vacanavasena
tika-s0402t34:29_3: “sahadhammenāti sahetunā”ti. Hetūti ca upapattisādhanahetu veditabbo, na kārako,
tika-s0402t34:29_4: sampāpako vā. Nimittanti codanāya kāraṇaṁ. Tattha codako codanaṁ karotīti kāraṇaṁ,
tika-s0402t34:29_5: dhammo codanaṁ karoti etenāti kāraṇaṁ. Tenāha “puggalopī”tiādi. Khemanti kenaci appaṭibāhiyabhāvena anupaddutaṁ.
tika-s0402t34:30_0: Antarāyo etesaṁ atthi, antarāye vā niyuttāti antarāyikā. Evaṁbhūtā pana te yasmā
tika-s0402t34:30_1: antarāyakarā nāma honti, tasmā āha “antarāyaṁ karontīti antarāyikā”ti. Asañcicca
tika-s0402t34:30_2: vītikkame nātisāvajjāti katvā vuttaṁ “sañcicca vītikkantā”ti. Satta āpattikkhandhātiādi
tika-s0402t34:30_3: nidassanamattaṁ itaresampi catunnaṁ “antarāyikā”ti vuttadhammānaṁ tabbhāve byabhicārābhāvato.
tika-s0402t34:30_4: Idha pana methunadhammo adhippetoti idaṁ aṭṭhuppattivasena vuttaṁ ariṭṭhasikkhāpadaṁ
tika-s0402t34:30_5: viya. Yasmā taṁkhaṇampi kāmānaṁ ādīnavaṁ disvā virato hoti ce, visesaṁ adhigacchati,
tika-s0402t34:30_6: na kāmesu āsatto, tasmā vuttaṁ “methuna…pe…antarāyo hotī”ti. Tattha yassa kassacīti
tika-s0402t34:30_7: na kevalaṁ pabbajitasseva, atha kho yassa kassaci. Tathā hi vuttaṁ “methunamanuyuttassa,
tika-s0402t34:31: Tasmiṁ aniyyānikadhammeti tasmiṁ parehi parikappitaaniyyānikadhammanimittaṁ. Nimittatthe hi idaṁ kammasaṁyoge bhummaṁ.
tika-s0402t34:32: Upanibaddhāti viracitā. Tenāha “abhisaṅkhatā”ti. Puthubhāvanti bahubhāvaṁ. Puthūhi vā sitāti bahūhi samaṇabrāhmaṇehi sitā upanibaddhā.
tika-s0402t34:35_0: 9. Navame bhavati etena ārogyanti bhavo, gilānapaccayo. Parivuddho bhavo abhavo.
tika-s0402t34:35_1: Vuddhiattho hi ayamakāro yathā “saṁvarāsaṁvaro, phalāphala”nti ca. Sappinavanītādīnīti
tika-s0402t34:35_3: sabbassapi gilānapaccayassa saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Bhavābhavoti vā khuddako ceva mahanto
tika-s0402t34:35_4: ca upapattibhavo veditabbo. Tenevāha “sampattibhavesū”tiādi. Bhavoti vā sampatti,
tika-s0402t34:35_5: abhavoti vipatti. Bhavoti vuddhi, abhavoti hāni. Taṁnimittañca taṇhā uppajjatīti
tika-s0402t34:36_0: Taṇhādutiyoti taṇhāsahāyo. Taṇhā hi nirudakakantāre marīcikāya udakasaññā viya pipāsābhibhūtaṁ
tika-s0402t34:36_1: tasitaṁ sattaṁ assāsadassanavasena sahāyakiccaṁ karontī bhavādīsu anibbinnaṁ katvā
tika-s0402t34:36_2: paribbhamāpeti. Tathā hi taṁ papātakaṁ acintetvā madhuggaṇhanakaluddakā viya anekādīnavākulesu
tika-s0402t34:36_3: bhavesu ānisaṁsameva dassentī anatthajāle sā paribbhamāpeti, tasmā taṇhā “purisassa
tika-s0402t34:36_4: dutiyā”ti vuttā. Nanu ca aññepi kilesādayo bhavanibbattipaccayāti? Saccametaṁ, na
tika-s0402t34:36_5: pana tathā visesapaccayo, yathā taṇhā. Tathā hi sā kusalehi vinā akusalehi, kāmāvacarādikusalehi
tika-s0402t34:36_6: ca vinā rūpāvacarādikusalehi bhavanibbattiyā visesapaccayo. Yato samudayasaccanti
tika-s0402t34:36_7: vuccatīti. Itthabhāvaññathābhāvanti itthabhāvo ca aññathābhāvo ca itthabhāvaññathābhāvo,
tika-s0402t34:36_8: so etassa atthīti itthabhāvaññathābhāvo, saṁsāro, taṁ itthabhāvaññathābhāvaṁ. Tattha
tika-s0402t34:36_9: itthabhāvo manussattaṁ, aññathābhāvo tato avasiṭṭhasattāvāsā. Itthabhāvo vā tesaṁ
tika-s0402t34:36_10: tesaṁ sattānaṁ paccuppanno attabhāvo, aññathābhāvo anāgatattabhāvo. Evarūpo vā aññopi
tika-s0402t34:36_11: attabhāvo itthabhāvo, na evarūpo aññathābhāvo. Tenevāha “itthabhāvaññathābhāvanti
tika-s0402t34:36_12: ettha itthabhāvo nāma ayaṁ attabhāvo”tiādi. Saṁsaraṇaṁ saṁsāro.
tika-s0402t34:39: Tenāha “khandhadhātuāyatanānaṁ paṭipāṭi”nti, khandhadhātuāyatanānaṁ hetuphalabhāvena aparāparappavattinti attho.
tika-s0402t34:40_0: Evamādīnavaṁñatvāti ettha etamādīnavaṁ ñatvātipi paṭhanti, etaṁ sakalavaṭṭadukkhassa
tika-s0402t34:40_1: sambhavaṁ samudayaṁ taṇhaṁ ādīnavaṁ ñatvāti attho. Atha vā evamādīnavaṁ ñatvāti etaṁ
tika-s0402t34:40_2: yathāvuttaṁ saṁsārānativattanaādīnavaṁ dosaṁ ñatvā. Niggahaṇoti caturūpādānasaṅkhātassa
tika-s0402t34:40_3: sabbassa gahaṇassa paṭinissajjanena niggahaṇo, khandhaparinibbānena saṅkhārappavattito
tika-s0402t34:40_4: apagaccheyyāti evaṁ vā ettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0402t34:43_0: 10. Dasame yojentīti kammaṁ vipākena bhavādiṁ, bhavantarādīhi dukkhena sattaṁ yojenti
tika-s0402t34:43_1: ghaṭentīti yogā. Kāmanaṭṭhena kāmo ca so yathāvuttenatthena yogo cāti kāmayogo. Bhavayogo
tika-s0402t34:43_2: nāma bhavarāgoti dassetuṁ “rūpārūpabhavesū”tiādi vuttaṁ. Tattha paṭhamo upapattibhavesu
tika-s0402t34:43_3: rāgo, dutiyo kammabhavesu, tatiyo bhavadiṭṭhisahagato yathā rajjanaṭṭhena rāgo, evaṁ
tika-s0402t34:43_4: yujjanaṭṭhena yogoti vutto. Catūsu saccesu aññāṇanti idaṁ suttantanayaṁ nissāya vuttaṁ.
tika-s0402t34:44_0: Samudayanti dve samudayā khaṇikasamudayo paccayasamudayo ca. Uppādakkhaṇo khaṇikasamudayo,
tika-s0402t34:44_1: paccayova paccayasamudayo. Samudayate samudayanaṁ samudayo, samudeti etasmāti samudayoti
tika-s0402t34:44_2: evaṁ ubhinnaṁ samudayānaṁ saddatthatopi bhedo veditabbo. Paccayasamudayaṁ pajānantopi
tika-s0402t34:44_3: bhikkhu khaṇikasamudayaṁ pajānāti, khaṇikasamudayaṁ pajānantopi paccayasamudayaṁ
tika-s0402t34:44_4: pajānāti. Paccayato hi saṅkhārānaṁ udayaṁ passato khaṇato ca nesaṁ udayadassanaṁ
tika-s0402t34:44_5: sukhaṁ hoti, khaṇato ca nesaṁ udayaṁ passato pageva paccayānaṁ suggahitattā paccayato
tika-s0402t34:44_6: dassanaṁ sukhena ijjhati. Idha pana khaṇikasamudayaṁ dassento āha “samudayanti uppatti”nti.
tika-s0402t34:45_0: Atthaṅgamopi duvidho accantatthaṅgamo, bhedatthaṅgamoti. Accantatthaṅgamo appavattinirodho,
tika-s0402t34:45_1: nibbānanti keci. Bhedatthaṅgamo khaṇikanirodho. Tadubhayaṁ pubbabhāge uggahaparipucchādivasena
tika-s0402t34:45_2: passato aññataradassanena itaradassanampi siddhameva hoti. Pubbabhāgeyeva ārammaṇavasena
tika-s0402t34:45_3: khayato vayato sammasanādikāle bhedatthaṅgamaṁ passanto byatirekavasena anussavādito
tika-s0402t34:45_4: accantatthaṅgamaṁ passati, maggakkhaṇe pana ārammaṇato accantatthaṅgamaṁ passanto
tika-s0402t34:45_5: asammohato itarampi passati. Idha pana bhedatthaṅgamaṁ dassento āha “atthaṅgamanti
tika-s0402t34:45_6: bheda”nti. Kāmānaṁ uppattibhedaggahaṇeneva cettha yathā kāmānaṁ paṭiccasamuppannatā
tika-s0402t34:45_7: vibhāvitā, evaṁ kāmavatthunopīti ubhayesampi aniccatā dukkhatā anattatā ca vibhāvitāti
tika-s0402t34:45_8: daṭṭhabbaṁ. Madhurabhāvanti iminā kāmasannissitaṁ sukhaṁ somanassaṁ dasseti. “Yaṁ
tika-s0402t34:45_9: kho, bhikkhave, ime pañca kāmaguṇe paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṁ somanassaṁ, ayaṁ kāmānaṁ
tika-s0402t34:45_10: assādo”ti hi vuttaṁ. Amadhurabhāvanti iminā pana kāmahetukaṁ dukkhaṁ domanassaṁ dasseti.
tika-s0402t34:46_0: Phassāyatanānanti chadvārikassa phassassa kāraṇabhūtānaṁ cakkhādiāyatanānaṁ. Tenāha
tika-s0402t34:46_2: mano-saddassa viya ca purimapadassa okārantatā daṭṭhabbā. Punobhavo sīlametesanti
tika-s0402t34:46_3: ponobhavikā. Atha vā sīlatthena ikasaddena gamitatthattā kiriyāvācakasaddassa adassanaṁ
tika-s0402t34:46_4: daṭṭhabbaṁ yathā apūpabhakkhanasīlo āpūpiko. Atha vā punabbhavaṁ denti, punabbhavāya
tika-s0402t34:46_5: saṁvattanti, punappunabbhave nibbattentīti ponobhavikā. “Taddhitā”ti hi bahuvacananiddesā
tika-s0402t34:46_6: vicittattā vā taddhitānaṁ abhidhānalakkhaṇattā vā “punabbhavaṁ dentī”tiādīsupi atthesu
tika-s0402t34:47: Visaṁyojenti paṭipannaṁ puggalaṁ kāmayogādito viyojentīti visaṁyogā, asubhajjhānādīni visaṁyojanakāraṇāni. Tenāha “visaṁyogāti visaṁyojanakāraṇānī”tiādi.
